item.title: Democrats Committed Massive Vote Fraud in 2008, They'll Do It Again in 2012
item.description:
John McCain knew that Obama’s minions orchestrated massive voter fraud in Ohio and Pennsylvania. Besides using New Black Panther Party soldiers to repel McCain voters from the polls,** Democrats stuff ballot boxes to give Obama the win in two states with a combined 41 electoral votes**.
Here’s how a memo leaked by wikileaks summarized McCain’s election night decision: After discussions with his inner circle, which explains the delay in his speech, McCain decided not to pursue the voter fraud in PA and Ohio, despite his staff’s desire to make it an issue.
